ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Each of them will come to Him on the Day of Rising all alone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Every one of them will come before Him all alone on the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: On the Day of Resurrection each one of these will come to Him singly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Everyone on the Day of Judgment will individually come into the presence of God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And each one of them will come before Him on the Day of Resurrection, alone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And everyone of them will come to Him alone on the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And every one of them will come to Him on the day of resurrection alone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Every one of them shall come to Him upon the Day of Resurrection, all alone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And each one of them will come unto Him on the Day of Resurrection, alone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: each one of them shall come to Him one by one on the Day of Judgement.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And each of them is to come to Him on the Day of Judgment alone. *Chapter: 19
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and each of them will come to Him alone on the Day of Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And everyone of them will come to Him singly on the Day of Judgment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And everyone of them will come to Him alone on the Day of Resurrection (without any helper, or protector or defender).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and each one shall come to Him on the Day of Resurrection, alone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And each one of them will come to Him on the Day of Resurrection alone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And all of them are coming to Him on the Day of Resurrection alone.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:95] And each one of them will come to Him on the Day of Resurrection, [each one] alone, without wealth or any helper to protect him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And each one of them will come unto Him) and each of them will come to Allah (on the Day of Resurrection, alone) without wealth or offspring.
